projects.description: Practiced my knowledge of basic JavaScript syntax and data structures by building a Random Quote Generator, a program that displays a randomly selected quote each time the user clicks a button.
In this project, I wrote JavaScript to display several “pages” of student data that the user can easily navigate through and view. This project focused on DOM manipulation.

An interactive web form that has great accessability and solid form validation. Skills showcased to create this interactive web form was understanding HTML Forms, Data Validation, RegEx, and Event Handlers

Created a browser-based, word guessing game: Phrase Hunter. Area of focus for this project was JavaScript and OOP (Object-Oriented Programming) to select a random, hidden phrase. User then tries to guess the phrase by selecting individual letters from an onscreen keyboard. Also added a timer for bonus.

Created an employee directory by communicating with a third-party API (Application Programming Interface). This project was done to demonstrate my skills and knowledge in making HTTP Requests, Promises, Fetch and Asynchronous Programming
